data.event: Pioneers settled into the area about 1820.

event.title: was named after the French capital in 1874

data.event: The Logan County seat, Paris, was named after the French capital in 1874.

event.title: remained the town's prison for many years

data.event: The town prison was constructed nearly three blocks from the courthouse, and remained the town's prison for many years.
The prison now serves as the Logan County Museum.
